content_html:
All of us have that list of big purchases that we'd like to make once our budget allows it: A new TV, new laptop, new tablet, or new gaming console are likely among your inspirations to not order Uber Eats for the third time this week.

The only thing harder than saving up may simply be choosing which item you need the most right now. 

Here's a deal to cross off two things in one purchase: This Walmart bundle includes a 55-inch LG OLED TV and an Xbox One S together for $1,496.99. For reference, this TV alone is originally $2,299 and on sale for $1,499 on LG's site — so that's a savings of $800 on the TV, plus the $200-ish that an Xbox One S goes for.

The B8 series TVs go far past making your living room look like an expensive penthouse (though that is a bonus). The noticeably thin design somehow packs a 3,840 x 2,160 4K Ultra HD display, Dolby Vision, and 2.2 channel Dolby Atmos. 

Image: lg

As a smart TV, LG's AI ThinQ seals the deal with voice commands and Alexa or Google Assistant compatibility. All of your apps for movies, TV shows, and video games are ready to go — and speaking of video games, Red Dead Redemption II and Fortnite on your new Xbox will look great on that 4K display.

There are no reviews on the bundle itself, but the seller has a 4.3/5 star rating and over 1,000 positive reviews.

Regularly $2,037.61 for the bundle (or $2,299 for the TV elsewhere), you can grab the TV and Xbox together for $1,496.99 — a total savings of nearly $1,000.




55-inch LG OLED TV (B8 series) and  Xbox One S bundle  — $1,496.99
See Details

By Leah StodartMashable Deals2019-04-05 14:41:33 UTC

All of us have that list of big purchases that we'd like to make once our budget allows it: A new TV, new laptop, new tablet, or new gaming console are likely among your inspirations to not order Uber Eats for the third time this week.
